scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:react && npm run build:angular && npm run build:svelte && npm run build:vue && npm run build:website
scripts.publish:ts: cd packages/ts && npm run build && npm run publish:dist
scripts.publish:angular: cd packages/angular && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.publish:react: cd packages/react && npm run build && npm run publish:dist
scripts.publish:svelte: cd packages/svelte && npm run build && npm run publish:dist
scripts.publish:vue: cd packages/vue && npm run build && npm run publish:dist
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:ts && npm run publish:angular && npm run publish:react && npm run publish:svelte && npm run publish:vue
scripts.publish:ts:beta: cd packages/ts && npm run build && npm run publish:dist -- --tag beta
scripts.publish:angular:beta: cd packages/angular && npm run build && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.publish:react:beta: cd packages/react && npm run build && npm run publish:dist -- --tag beta
scripts.publish:svelte:beta: cd packages/svelte && npm run build && npm run publish:dist -- --tag beta
scripts.publish:vue:beta: cd packages/vue && npm run build && npm run publish:dist -- --tag beta
scripts.publish:all:beta: npm run publish:ts:beta && npm run publish:angular:beta && npm run publish:react:beta && npm run publish:svelte:beta && npm run publish:vue:beta
scripts.install:clean: for p in packages/*; do rm -f $p/package-lock.json; rm -rf $p/node_modules; done; rm -rf node_modules; npm i
scripts.gather-licenses: for p in packages/*; do echo "  ðŸ“„ Checking licenses for $p"; npx license-report --package=$p/package.json --config lic-report-config.json --output=table > $p/licences.temp; mv -f $p/licences.temp $p/licences.txt; done
